tag-def.description: The highway tag is the primary tag used for highways. It is often the only tag. There are conventions for its use in particular countries.

value-def.description: A restricted access major divided highway, normally with 2 or more running lanes plus emergency hard shoulder. Equivalent to the Freeway, Autobahn, etc..
The link roads (sliproads/ramps) leading to/from a motorway from/to a motorway or lower class highway. Normally with the same motorway restrictions.
For roads used mainly/exclusively for pedestrians/shopping areas. Also for tagging squares and plazas (in which case, add area=yes.
A small bus stop. Larger stations should be tagged as amenity=bus_station instead.

tag-def.description: The operator tag can be used to name a company or corporation who's responsible for a certain object or who operates it.

The common default name. (Note: For disputed areas, please use the name as displayed on e.g. street signs for the name tag. Put all alternatives into either localized name tags (e.g. name:tr/name:el) or the variants (e.g. loc_name/old_name/alt_name). Thank you.)
